articles.author: Celina Tebor, Ryan W. Miller, Bart Jansen and Josh Meyer, USA TODAY
articles.title: Biden to sign bill for $40B in Ukraine aid while in Asia; fighting remains intense: Live updates - USA TODAY
articles.description: President Joe Biden says Ukraine war shows the need to protect supply chain. U.S. accuses Russia of weaponizing food. Updates.
articles.content:

articles.title: Chinese military exercises in South China Sea coincide with Joe Biden's first East Asia visit - ABC News
articles.description: China is holding military exercises in the disputed South China Sea coinciding with US President Joe Biden's visits to South Korea and Japan that are largely focused on countering the perceived threat from Beijing.

articles.title: Asian shares jump as China cuts key lending benchmark - Reuters
articles.description: Asian shares jumped on Friday after China cut a key lending benchmark to support a slowing economy, but a gauge of global equities remained set for its longest weekly losing streak on record amid investor worries about sluggish growth.
